00015                     /* default file access permissions for new files */
00016 #define DIR_MODE    (FILE_MODE | S_IXUSR | S_IXGRP | S_IXOTH)

00019 typedef void    Sigfunc(int);   /* for signal handlers */
00020 
00021                     /* 4.3BSD Reno <signal.h> doesn't define SIG_ERR */
00022 #if defined(SIG_IGN) && !defined(SIG_ERR)
00023 #define SIG_ERR ((Sigfunc *)-1)
00024 #endif

00069 int     lock_reg(int, int, int, off_t, int, off_t);
00070                                     /* {Prog lockreg} */
00071 #define read_lock(fd, offset, whence, len) \
00072             lock_reg(fd, F_SETLK, F_RDLCK, offset, whence, len)
00073 #define readw_lock(fd, offset, whence, len) \
00074             lock_reg(fd, F_SETLKW, F_RDLCK, offset, whence, len)
00075 #define write_lock(fd, offset, whence, len) \
00076             lock_reg(fd, F_SETLK, F_WRLCK, offset, whence, len)
00077 #define writew_lock(fd, offset, whence, len) \
00078             lock_reg(fd, F_SETLKW, F_WRLCK, offset, whence, len)
00079 #define un_lock(fd, offset, whence, len) \
00080             lock_reg(fd, F_SETLK, F_UNLCK, offset, whence, len)
00081

00086             lock_test(fd, F_RDLCK, offset, whence, len)

00088             lock_test(fd, F_WRLCK, offset, whence, len)
